Encode a base64 object consisting of the username signed with the
host secret key and the username. Can be reassembled with the
hosts secret key to validate user.

\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:module-views.utils}}\index{views.utils (module)@\spxentry{views.utils}\spxextra{module}}\index{get\_element\_count() (in module views.utils)@\spxentry{get\_element\_count()}\spxextra{in module views.utils}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:views.utils.get_element_count}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{views.utils.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{get\_element\_count}}}{\emph{data}, \emph{element}}{}
Determine the number of tasks created by removing 
the four other elements from count and divide by the 
number of variables in one task.
\begin{quote}
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{param data}] \leavevmode
The data object from web.input

\item[{return}] \leavevmode
The number of tasks opened by the client

\end{description}\end{quote}
\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}
